transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello. Hello sir, Vishal bol raha hu sir IndiaMART se sir.
Customer: Hello, aawaz aa rahi hai sir aapko?
Executive: Aawaz aati hai, aawaz aati hai, bolo.
Executive: Haan sir, Vishal bol raha hu IndiaMART se sir. Bataiye sir aapko kya issue tha sir? By lead nahi mil rahi thi sir aapko relevant?
Customer: Issue jo hai by lead consume nahi ho raha hai.
Executive: By lead consume nahi ho raha hai ya relevant nahi mil rahi hai aapko?
Customer: Nahi ho raha hai by lead generate nahi ho raha hai, acha by lead nahi aa raha hai.
Executive: Achcha by lead nahi aa raha hai.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Okay. To sir aap mujhe just abhi main aapko dikhata hu aapko by leads relevant nahi mil rahi hai aap ye keh rahe hai. Aap daily basis pe by lead to consume kar rahe hai sir?
Customer: Daily basis me hum log consume kar rahe hai lekin wo acha khasa nahi hai. Jo aa raha hai wo jyadatar bahar ka bekar hi laga hai.
Executive: Dekha. Okay. To ek minute main dekh leta hu. Jo aa raha hai by lead jo aa raha hai ek do aa raha hai. Uske liye isko badhane ke liye kya karna padega?
Executive: Uske liye sir main aapko ek suggestion dunga just aap abhi open IndiaMART ka account jo hai wo kis mein open kar rahe hai aap laptop mein ya phone mein?
Customer: Phone mein.
Executive: Phone mein ek bar open kijiye apna.
Customer: Haan open kiya.
Customer: Open kar liya.
Executive: Haan usme past lead section mein jaiye aap.
Customer: Open usme by lead mein gaye by lead section mein aap?
Customer: By lead section mein. One minute main ja raha hu.
Customer: By lead by lead section mein upar jayenge to relevant ek relevant ka option aa raha hoga ek recent ka usse just side mein jayenge to past lead ka section bhi aa raha hoga sir aapka ek.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Past lead ka section dikh raha hai aapko past leads ka?
Customer: Haan past lead dikha raha hai.
Executive: Haan usme past leads mein jaiye aap dekhiye aapko sold out by leads dikha raha hoga sari jitni bhi dikha raha hoga.
Customer: Past leads mein aapko leads dikh rahi hai?
Customer: Haan dekh rahe hai lekin isme to Kolkata ye sab Murshidabad dikha raha hai haan.
Executive: Sari by leads sold out hongi but jitni bhi by leads hongi aapki category se related hongi sir. Relevant by leads hongi aap check kijiye jitni bhi aapko relevant lag rahi hai sab pe I am interested mark kijiye sir aap.
Customer: Sir kar raha hu.
Executive: Haan I am interested mark kijiye jitni bhi aapko lag rahi hai by leads.
Customer: Haan uske baad?
Executive: Haan sir.
Customer: Tab wo aana shuru hoga na?
Executive: Haan by leads unko aap relevant I am interested mark kar dijiye sab pe.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan sab diya kar raha hai.
Executive: Haan I am interested mark kiya aapne?
Customer: Haan kiya kiya.
Executive: Haan to sir jitni bhi by leads aapko dikh rahi hai I am interested wo relevant unko aap I am interested mark kijiye aur jo bhi jyada se jyada by lead hai na aap ek bar thoda wait kijiyega kyuki har har aadha ghante mein jo IndiaMART ka page hai na sir wo refresh hota hai to automatically aapko aane lag jayengi aap nishchint rahiye koi dikkat issue nahi aayengi sir relevant by leads milne lag jayengi aapko.
Customer: Okay okay okay.
Executive: Haan sir to aapne kitni by leads pe sir I am interested mark kar diya?
Customer: Automatically 10 12 kar diya.
Executive: 10 12 kar diya na aisa rehta hai na sir jaise aap agar youtube vagaira dekhte honge to usme sir aapki feed save ho jati hai jo aapki jaise hi aapne matlab videos dekhi hai to waisi video aane lagti hai automatically to aise IndiaMART ka page hai AI based hai ye automatically aapko by leads dega ek bar main kal aapko connect kar lunga sir din mein. Theek hai?
Customer: Okay sir kal.
Executive: Kal main aapko video meet pe kal main aapko video meet pe connect kar lunga to usme sir main aapko sari cheeze ek bar acche se dikha dunga aur acche se hum by leads ke bare mein by lead vagaira dekh lenge jo bhi issue aap face kar rahe honge theek hai na sir?
Customer: Theek hai chaliye.
Executive: Aur abhi sir aapne 9696 number pe call kiya tha to uske regarding meri ticket ek ticket raise ho gayi jisse main abhi close kar de raha hu sir. Yes sir.
Customer: Achcha sir theek hai kar dijiye.
Executive: Haan aur baki sir ek agar mere feedback ke regarding aapke pass message aaye to use aap satisfy kar dijiyega baki main aapko kal main aapko connect karunga sir. Theek hai?
Customer: Okay okay.
Executive: Hai na abhi main close kar de raha hu sir ticket ko theek hai sir? Okay close kar dijiye. Kal kal main kitne baje connect karunga aapko din mein?
Customer: Kal mere ko aap 1 baje ke baad connect kijiye 12 baje se meeting hai.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Uske baad aap 1 baje mere ko connect kijiye theek hai?
Executive: Bilkul sir main 1 baje aapko connect kar lunga bilkul 1 baje connect kar lunga just aadha second aur lunga aapka 1 baje connect karunga but sir ek message aayega aapko mere feedback ke regarding to usko aap satisfy hi likhiyega not satisfy mat likhiyega baki main kal aapko sara feedback de dunga sir jo bhi by leads aapko not relevant dikh rahi hai jo bhi hai theek hai sir? Ek dam ek dam koi baat nahi.
Executive: Yes sir. Haan sir okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- By leads are not being generated.

- Current by leads are mostly irrelevant.



Resolution:

- Executive suggested marking relevant by leads.

- Executive explained how IndiaMART page refreshes.

- Executive offered a video meet to resolve issues.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will connect via video meet tomorrow.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, relevant, i'm interested, refresh, video meet
